Package ru.nsu.buzyurkin

Class Semester

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.nsu.buzyurkin.Semester
  • public class Semester
extends java.lang.Object
    The Semester class represents a collection of subjects and their corresponding grades for a semester. It provides methods to add subjects with grades and check if a stipend is acquired based on the grades.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Grade> semester
      A map to store subjects and their corresponding grades for the semester.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor Description
      Semester()
      Constructs a new Semester object with an empty map.

      Adds a subject with its corresponding grade to the semester.

    • Method Detail

      • addSubject

        public void addSubject​(java.lang.String subject,
                       Grade grade)
        Adds a subject with its corresponding grade to the semester.
        Parameters:
        subject - The name of the subject.
        grade - The Grade object representing the grade obtained in the subject.

      • stipendAcquired

        public boolean stipendAcquired()
        Checks if the grades in the semester are sufficient to acquire a stipend.
        Returns:
        true if the stipend is acquired (all grades are equal to or greater than the B grade), false otherwise.
